#Help for the Maze block "turn right" and "turn left".

<screenshot1> <screenshot2>

|| *Option* || *Description* ||
||turn *right* ||Turns Pegman to face right but doesn't move him any squares in the new direction.||
||turn *left* ||Turns Pegman to face left but doesn't move him any squares in the new direction.||

*Tip*: To move Pegman in the new direction, use the [http://domain/page label] *move* block.
